_description: Image classification loader from an annotation csv file.

csvfile._description: Annotation csv file containing image file path and it's label

encoding._description: Encoding to use for UTF when reading/writing (ex. utf-8)

label_sep._description: For multi-label problem, label text is split by this parameter value. This value will be interpreted as regular expressions and will also force the use of the Python parsing engine.

rgb._description: This parameter determines the color format. If True, then the color format is given as RGB. Otherwise, it is given as BGR.

header._description: Row number to use as the column names, and the start of the data.

comment._description: Indicate remainder of line should not be parsed. For example, if comment="#", parsing#empty\na,b,c\n1,2,3 with header=0 will result in "a,b,c" being treated as the header.

name: ImageClassificationFromCSV
